publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1786 Mr Mark Ruskell: Scottish Food Fortnight—That the Parliament welcomes the second annual celebration of Scotland’s regional produce, Scottish Food Fortnight, taking place between 18 September and 3 October 2004, which aims to highlight the world-class quality of Scottish produce, support farms, small rural businesses and independent shops and reduce "food miles" by strengthening local food networks and creating the shortest chain between producer and consumer and preserve local independent retailing and catering by encouraging Scottish people and visitors to Scotland to buy regional speciality food and drink from small shops, pubs, hotels and restaurants.

S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Robert Brown*, Richard Lochhead*, Bruce Crawford*, Patrick Harvie*, Carolyn Leckie*, Shiona Baird*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Elaine Smith*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Trish Godman*, Linda Fabiani*, Frances Curran*, Alex Fergusson*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Marlyn Glen*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, John Scott*, Murdo Fraser*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1786 Mr Mark Ruskell: Scottish Food Fortnight—That the Parliament welcomes the second annual celebration of Scotland’s regional produce, Scottish Food Fortnight, taking place between 18 September and 3 October 2004, which aims to highlight the world-class quality of Scottish produce, support farms, small rural businesses and independent shops and reduce "food miles" by strengthening local food networks and creating the shortest chain between producer and consumer and preserve local independent retailing and catering by encouraging Scottish people and visitors to Scotland to buy regional speciality food and drink from small shops, pubs, hotels and restaurants. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Mrs Nanette Milne, Christine Grahame, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Robert Brown, Richard Lochhead, Bruce Crawford, Patrick Harvie, Carolyn Leckie, Shiona Baird, Roseanna Cunningham, Elaine Smith, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Trish Godman, Linda Fabiani, Frances Curran, Alex Fergusson, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Marlyn Glen, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, John Scott, Murdo Fraser, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Rosie Kane*, Nora Radcliffe*, Margo MacDonald*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1786 Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 28 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
